author: Retro Game Corps
description:
After much anticipation, Anbernic RG DS is finally here, and it's a lot worse than I expected.  Let's discuss what went wrong and why I don't think it's in a reviewable state.

More info (non-affiliate):
Anbernic website: https://anbernic.com/products/rgds
AliExpress: https://www.aliexpress.us/item/3256810046024839.html

Stylus video: https://youtu.be/BoYp30Meki0
My favorite stylus: https://www.etsy.com/listing/4389860171/small-gaming-stylus-solid-aluminum-retro
use code "RETROSTYLUS" for 30% off

Phawx RG DS video: https://youtu.be/gvGIMPTPDQA
DraStic fork: https://github.com/R-YaTian/DraStic_rev_i18n/releases

This was a review unit sent to me by the manufacturer.  All opinions are my own, they did not see this video ahead of time, and no money was exchanged in any way.

Ways to support this channel:
RGC merch: https://store.retrogamecorps.com
Stickers and magnets: https://www.ebay.com/str/retrogamecorpscharitystore
YT channel membership: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCoZQiN0o7f3
title: Anbernic RG DS: Half-Baked Mess
